name: Animated Fourier Heart
description:
This is a more advanced animation based on the techniques used to make the Animated Infinity Symbol.


Compared to that one, this one is completely built by using the Fourier series.


Unfortunately, this file doesn't contain a solution to draw any shape. It may be the first step on finding the solution.
